page.title: 16MILLERS TRACTOR YARD
page.content: On Tuesday we went down to Millers farm. The Millers have two trucks of their own and one hired truck . They sell second-hand tractors and they also hire out farm equipment of all kinds. When we were at Millers farm they had 25 tractors but they have some- times had over 100 in the yard. They repair tractors and spray them and steam clean them and deliver them all over the world .The furthest they've been is Pakistan and they've been to Greece and Turkey and Africa and Americas . They have been in business for 35 years . They employ 7 men who start work at half past 8 in the morning. We saw 3 combines,one was burnt out, and a tractor that was burnt out too. The men strip out the burnt pieces and put in new parts.
